attributes.action: Have the Crockermouth Bridge rebuilt and named after the police constable killed when it collapsed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PC Bill Barker was killed doing his duty protecting the public from danger.  This is the risk run every day by policemen and women and although rare, these tradegies occur.
It is important that we the public show some measure of gratitude to these public servants and I believe renaming the bridge which should be unvieled by his widow or his children will give them comfort that the public at large do respect their work and indeed their courage.
